STATUS_ERR_BAR_CONSECUTIVE - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the error code when the selected bar was already moved in one of the two previous turns of a player.
STATUS_ERR_BAR_POSITION - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the error code when the new position of the bar is not permitted.
STATUS_ERR_BAR_SELECTED - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the error code when the selected bar was already moved by one of the opponents.
STATUS_ERR_NUMBER_PLAYERS - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the error code when the number of players is out of bound.
STATUS_ERR_PLACED_BEAD - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the error code when the bead is placed in an invalid place.
STATUS_ERR_SAME_PREVIOUS_PLAYER - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the error code when the player is trying to move two times in a row.
STATUS_OK - Static variable in class it.polimi.group03.util.Constant
This constant holds the the status code for success.

This class is used to hold more specific information about an action perform in the game.
